title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.2 - Time and place for inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.2 - Time and place for inspection

State Regulations

Those records requested shall be made available at the
offices of the commission Monday through Friday, except legal holidays, between
the hours of 9:30 a.m. and 4:30 p.m. Arrangements to inspect and copy records
during those hours should be made in accordance with the procedures described
in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6700.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
